thread.title: Donald Trump’s biggest fan: a British Scientologist who lives in a castle
thread.title_full: Donald Trump’s biggest fan: a British Scientologist who lives in a castle - MarketWatch

author: Priya Anand
title: Donald Trump’s biggest fan: a British Scientologist who lives in a castle
text:
Hello, MarketWatchers.
6 jobs no woman has ever had The U.S. Navy SEALs announced on Tuesday that it will allow women who pass their rigorous training program to serve in the force.
7 things we’ve learned from the Ashley Madison leak More than 36 million accounts have been exposed from the website that helps people cheat on their spouses.
Marijuana marathon races look to break stoner stigma Marijuana users on the west coast are running, or walking, away from the popular image of the Jeff Spicoli-like pot smoker.
Donald Trump’s biggest fan is a British Scientologist who lives in a castle John Mappin, a media investor in England, has placed more than 15 wagers that Trump will secure the Republican presidential nomination.
5 tourist destinations with the most malicious Wi-Fi networks Times Square is the runaway No. 1 tourist destination in the world when it comes to malicious Wi-Fi networks that a cellphone user could connect to.
ELSEWHERE ON MARKETWATCH: A ‘death cross’ in Apple’s stock is coming Apple shares have stabilized just above multi-month lows, but this slideshow of charts warns that not only should investors be weary of buying the stock, but that a further selloff into bear-market territory could be right around the corner.
